title: The Techno Gecko
description: Are you looking for a hoppin' good time? Join Dr. G, the techno gecko, as he rocks the joint with some sick beats. He's got cool rhymes that you'll be sure to dig because he's the most charming DJ around!This book has a rhyme on every page, which is catchy for young children and enables memory through phonics. Phonics is a method of teaching people to read by correlating sounds with letters or groups of letters in an alphabetic writing system. Teaching phonics and rhyming to a child develops their phonological awareness skills â€“ which play an important part of becoming a good reader.
author: K. Michelle Edge
